mapper.select: SELECT s.schedule_id, s.emp_id, s.schedule_name, s.schedule_content, s.schedule_start, s.schedule_end, s.schedule_color, s.schedule_allDay, GROUP_CONCAT(ss.share_emp) AS share_emp -- 공유 직원 목록 FROM schedule s JOIN schedule_share ss ON s.schedule_id = ss.schedule_id WHERE s.emp_id = #{empId} OR ss.share_emp LIKE CONCAT('%', #{shareEmp}, '%') -- shareEmp를 LIKE로 처리 GROUP BY s.schedule_id, s.emp_id, s.schedule_name, s.schedule_content, s.schedule_start, s.schedule_end, s.schedule_color, s.schedule_allDay
